alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 8:19PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of northeastern Idaho, south central Missoula, northwestern Granite and northwestern Ravalli Counties through 900 PM MDT/800 PM PDT/... At 818 PM MDT/718 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking intense snow showers along a line extending from near Florence to 11 miles northwest of Victor to 19 miles west of Woodside. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-quarter mile or less and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lolo, Stevensville, Victor, Florence, Bell Crossing, Quigley and Clinton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 119 and 125. Highway 93 S between mile markers 57 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
